The game is alright. I mean it's better then having your toe nails pulled while being waterboarded.

2021 02 14 Edit:
After careful consideration I have realized that getting upset irritated and annoyed is not worth playing the game. 
The main points of irritation is:
The developers rework things no one asks for.
The game is now bugged beyond playability. Having hitboxes completely broken, as in getting hit around corners through dropped pallets and getting stuck in the map.
They reworked the UI which is really bad, as in they changed the layout, having the icons reworked and a couple things added is fine but having that done and moved around your screen is not a great idea.

Secondly no one asked for this, what people have been asking for is colorblind settings and other balances and fixes, such as getting the MMR system back in working condition.

But what do we get?
An broken UI, better survivor T-bagging animations, and shadow changed hitboxes.

2021-11-25:
Ye The "fixed" hit boxes by taking a way the killers hits

this game is not a game, it is fucking an addictive substance made by god right before he went on to create hell. this game is only played by the scum of the earth and people who would scream slurs at a 10 yo with cancer. it is by all definitions, a horseshit game with asshole players and devs... but i will admit, i had fun with this game. this game was fun for a time with amazing gameplay and bugs that actually made the game better in hindsight. this game was kind of a masterpiece with flaws that gave it that status in my mind. this game even had communication! you can't even get any communication anymore! they fucked this game so hardly that i stopped playing. i literally have bad memories associated with this game bc of how shit it has become. YOU ADDED HELLRAISER AND REMOVED THE FUNNIEST MEME IN THE GAME! honestly the devs should probably move on at this point. they haven't even made anything good in the last 2-3 years. jesus fuck this game is ass, not only that but fucking boon totems? BOON TOTEMS? THIS IS LITERALLY THE NAIL IN THE COFFIN FOR ME. i just can't with this game. give me a dbd classic with the shrek looking graphics, the op killers and perks, the version where the demogorgon exists. this game has destroyed me and drove me to suicidal thoughts. i hope everyday that this game dies. the community of this game is such a shitshow filled with a bunch of horny assholes with no life or literal shit stains on the earth who would jump on the opportunity to dance on the grave of a child. fuck this game

This game is great. Funny with friends and (somewhat) serious solo. With options to play as killer or survivor, either way you will get a good time (unless you get gen rushed or hook camped). With all games there are however many bugs, but most are just model errors (such as the infamous hair bug) and very few bugs relate to poor gameplay. This game has so many things to grind that it will take time to get good and unlock new things, and this is where it get's bad. This game is the biggest grind to get new things. The currency you earn through gameplay, called Iridecent Shards, are granted every level (which takes 4 games per level normally) however you only get 100-300. That may sound generous but the fact you need 9,000 to unlock one new character (killer or survivor) deems unlocking new things a horrible grind and you might aswell buy characters you want through DLC's in steam or the paid currency Auric Cells (which is what I do).
Other than that this game is great and worth the money if you are into a horror/skill-based game and I highly recommend this game. See you in the trial.

Классная и атмосферная игра, но это только на лоу рангах и на сурвах. Единственное исключение - пик Доктора. Его тут берут чуть ли не каждую вторую игру, забыв, видимо, про остальных персонажей дбд. В остальном убийцы довольно обижены, но несут на себе бремя страданий во имя... Да хрен его знает. Но больше всего это дело чувствуется на высших рангах (10-1), где выжившие издеваются над манами, как только могут. А последние в свою очередь либо сливают ранг, чтобы нормально поиграть, либо терпят и ломают себе нервы. За сурва же геймплей максимально прост: ходи да чини генераторы. Главное - понимать, как мансить от убийцы, чтобы твои следы резко обрывались и не давали достаточно информации для поиска. 
Если говорить о системках, то игра средне оптимизирована, однако с конфигом идёт чуть ли не везде.

Советую сыграть в эту игру

Если вы зашли в игру, то готовьтесь:
1) Маньяк бьет тебя воздухом на расстоянии 5 метров
2)Если ты уже перепрыгнул окно, не думай что ты в безопасности -  читай 1 пункт
3)Если же ты по какой то причине решил отпустить генератор, то будь готов бежать - 90% что тебе повезет и ты его взорвешь
4)Очень много классных карт - ты ни**я не видишь и бегать тебе негде
5)Ноед на Майкле - что?!
Верните игру в то время, когда после починки генераторов было написано ''Найти выйти''

我是一个很胆小的人，但是黎明杀机并不是单纯的吓唬人，并没有向其他游戏一样一张鬼脸突然出来，而是你修电机，开门是那种紧张感。我跟讨厌为了吓唬人的恐怖游戏，但是黎明杀机带给我的游戏体验是非常好的。希望又更多的人加入，虽然这游戏很小众，但是我仍希望，她被大众所接受

我从去年十二月鬼武士刚出的时候入的坑，想想当初看见打折就顺便买下来了。
怎么说呢，我从2016年还是什么时候就在某直播平台看这个游戏的直播，然后觉得很有趣就关注了，直到被国内禁。
开始玩这个游戏的时候呢，我老气为什么打了QTE还是使发电机倒退，后来才知道原来是恶咒：毁灭，不过没多久制作组就改了，我就一直玩，一直玩。
从白段一直玩到紫段才会遛屠夫，这其中我还看了许多付导的视频，后面乐趣就来了。
等到了红段的时候，我玩这个游戏的心态也开始发生变化，经常生气，为什么队友不来救？为什么不修电机？为什么我秒倒了？
当然，后来就又变了，毕竟我又不是付导那种人皇，正常玩就行了，没必要为了自己必须变成人皇什么的。
总的来说，这个游戏的寿命我认为还很长，从联动了许多其他恐怖题材的影视或者游戏这一方面，以及每过几个月就出新屠夫什么的。
你要是觉得屠夫好玩就玩屠夫，你要是觉得人类好玩就玩人类，但是不能一直玩一个阵营，你会缺少很多乐趣，有些时候我玩了屠夫才知道有时候屠夫为什么要守尸，为什么要去针对，你只有真正体验过才会知道为什么。
我是个才几百小时的萌新，希望这个游戏能够越来越受欢迎，虽然是一个恐怖游戏，但是真的恐怖吗？XD

this game is honestly a shit show. while for the most part it is a fine game it has plenty of problems. hit boxes are straight up garbage. and the dc penalty literally doesnt help anything if people want to leave they are going to kill themselves  and all the dc penalty does is punish people who have shotty internet or even better yet when the game crashes and it still hits ya with a time ban like i sent your dumb asses a fucking crash report and you are still going to hit me with a dc penalty? why are you punishing me for your game having problems. like all the jank with hitboxes is annoying but this is actively trying to make me not play after ive put in over 1k hours and given them about $150. dont play this game while the time ban is active. and then to top it off the match making is almost useless  making killer matches a fucking terrible experience and honestly going to be the main reason this game fucking struggles to feel fucking fun. and then they give plenty of ways for people to purposely suck every drop of fun out of the game you watch any youtubers videos and you will probably see them getting 0 chance to play the game as people quite often go out of their way to be absolute cunts.

Every time I give BHVR Entertainment the benefit of the doubt they just take advantage of it and drive this game even further downhill. The PTBs are useless since they never listen to their community in any case, so almost every update comes with at least three game-breaking bugs that take months to get patched. The ingame monetization has reached a point where it will literally demand more than the price of a DLC for a cosmetic set for a SINGLE CHARACTER that CAN'T BE INTERCHANGED. The battle pass offers terrible retextured skins and mediocre point rewards.

But by far then worst thing about this game is the community. This game [i] will [/i] break you; it's just a matter of when. The way the sole mode is balanced perpetuates an us vs. them mentality that leads to some of the most toxic players in any game on Steam, period. It's honestly disgusting.

This game would be fun if BHVR actually took a step back and dedicated an update to game health. But they won't, because now they've realized they've reached the point where they can do whatever they want and the playerbase will eat it up, because it has nowhere else to go.

I'm gonna keep playing this because I've already sunk too much into this ship, and god knows I'll be riding it all the way down to Atlantis. I've had fun with this game in the past, which is why it's sad to say that [b] I cannot in good conscience recommend that anyone buy Dead by Daylight in its current state. [/b]
